reviews.review:
Il miglior gioco che io abbia mai giocato! Semplicemente Fantastico e MITICO!!!!

Ho molto apprezzato il Singleplayer e la modalità Cooperativa!

Semplicemente belissima la possibilità di creare poi tutti i livelli che vuoi con l'editor integrato!!! Super consigliato!!!

Pretty much the only good first-person puzzle game I've played. infinite replay value, make your own puzzles to impress and challenge your friends! Just make sure that you can beat them yourself! Plus, the map editor could make some sweet DnD maps.
Пиу-пиу!

Portal 2 is the fantastic sequel to the first portal game that I grew to love the first time I played it. This sequel does not disappoint as it returns with its usual dry, but hilarious, humor in addition to the good old classic portal puzzles, with some new twists.

Главные достоинства игры:
1)  наличие кооперативного режима игры.

2) наличие редактора карт (многие пользовательские карты, лучше оригинальных). Многие головоломки очень оригинальные и необычные. Часто играя в них удивляешься, сколько автор карты вложил сил и времени.

3) неплохая однопользовательская компания. Да она конечно простая, и тем не менее лучше начать играть в неё, чем с кооперативного режима.

Минусы: 

1) отсутствие крупных обновлений в данной игре. Сейчас игра живёт только благодаря игрокам, которые умеют "строить" качественные карты, впрочем таковых карт достаточно много (просто смотрите  карты с положительными рейтингом за последний год).

2) В кооперативной игре лучше всего играть с друзьями, ибо сейчас трудно найти постороннего человека для случайной игры.

Вообщем, если вы любитель головоломок, готовый "часами искать выход" из очередной карты, то эта игра для вас.
Are you still there...?

The second installment in a great series, Portal 2 is a great game. Not only is the single-player mode fun and interesting, but there is also multiplayer, custom maps, and much more. One last thing: the cake is a lie.

Portal 2 es una continuación perfecta de su antecesor. No sólo expande la duración y las posibilidades, sino que también hunde al jugador en una historia muy especial y atrapante. Jugarlo es una experiencia inolvidable por la que todos deberían pasar alguna vez.

If you look at Metcritic, this is the 7th best PC game of all time. Has a score of 95% from 52 critics. I played the first one many moons ago as I got it free with some Half Life bundle. At the time I just though that if Valve made it, then it must be worth a look. Chewing through the sweet pulp, you found at it's core that Portal was a tempting physics based puzzler, utilsing time and space to create 2 "portals" around a room in order to solve fiendishly devised puzzles. Portal 2 improved upon the formula by introducing more approachable humour in the voice talents of Steve Merchant. Smoother graphics and more refined sound make this the icing on a truly amazing puzzle game. Would I reccommend it? Whole heartidly yes. It's a must game. If you were a film fan this would be the equivelent of not seeing Rear Window by Hitchcock or Star Wars by Lucas. It should be in everyones collection and shows that a little bit of imagination can produce really inventive results.
More playtime that the first. Solid Co-Op so far. It's pretty good and it's worth the money.
Es una secretaria sesi ;)

Pretty good game, definitely worth checking out if you haven't already.

Overall: 7.1/10

Lo consiglio anche per l'ottima grafica e per la simpatia e la malvagità dei personaggi presenti nel gioco! Titolo da avere ASSOLUTAMENTE! Consigliato dal sottoscritto! Non ne resterete delusi! Parola del CASU!

Do I really need to say it? Even with all the people that felt they for some reason had to try and kill this one on launch. Portal 2 is aweaome! Keeps the puzzle solving fresh like the first game did, the humor is even more present than before and GLaDOS is just... GLaDOS. What's not to like about her? No, her being a murderous computer that wants to kill you doesn't count as a dislike, that's part of her charm..... what? Stop looking at me like that.

Portal 2 is an engaging puzzle game, and this sequel to the first (also amazing) game adds depth, extra challenges, and a lot of fun with the introduction of new substances that the player must manipulate in order to proceed.  The multiplayer aspect of this game is great - every puzzle requires you and your partner to work together to solve it, and ends up being quite a lot of fun in the process.

A primera vista puede parecer un simple juego con un par de puzles sin conexión alguna entre ellos, pero luego ( o mas bien nada mas empezar) descubres que es algo un poco mas complicado. La historia es realmente buena, te engancha desde el primer momento, con una introducción para el recuerdo. Y luego continua sin bajar el ritmo, tendrás mas y mas ganas para descubrir que viene a continuación. Se puede decir desde ya: UNA TRAMA INCREIBLE! Además los personajes, aun siendo pocos, tienen un peso mas que importante. Voces dobladas a un excelente castellano, personajes inolvidables, y un sonido (incluyendo la BSO) mas que correcto, con algunos temas muy buenos. Gráficos nada del otro mundo pero muy notables, con un diseño de escenarios muy detallado y elegante, en el que se puede ver la evolución de un Aperture destruido a poco a poco ir viendo como vuelve a la "normalidad". Además incluye un modo COOP que también añadirá historia a esta obra, y un Workshop increíble en el que se pueden encontrar contribuciones ESPECTACULARES! Juego 110% recomendado!!
bu oyunu oynamamak pişmanlıktır :)

This game is AWESOME! I loved the story and puzzles. In my books, it is one of the best first person games. It captivates you in a very unique way. I still play it once in a while, because of the custom rooms you can build yourself.

El mejor juego que existe.

1. The same engaging gameplay extended with new puzzle mechanics
2. Rich and humorous single player campaign
3. Very fun, standalone cooperative campaign
4. An experience that should not be missed

S Y N O P S I S:
The Portal franchise consists of puzzle gameplay that revolves around the player's ability to create portals on walls and ceilings allowing for physics based puzzle mechanics. Portal 2 delivers on every aspect that made the original great and expands its breadth without losing its identity by adding new game mechanics like physics augmenting fluids, light bridges/walls, and floating vortexes. The story here is as dark and hilarious as the original while offering more gameplay time. Once you've finished the single player campaign, you can jump into the testing labs with a friend to tackle two-player cooperative puzzles that will test your wits as well as your friendship (in a good way, of course). The story stands on its own, independent from the first game, making this title welcome to even new comers to the franchise. Although, I would recommend grabbing the first game as well. Portal 2 is great fun. Enough Said.

Valve, you have touched our hearts yet again with an awesome sequel to an awesome game, but you still can't count to three to save your damn lives. Portal 2 is an awesome game, it has great gameplay, easy to learn mechanics and controls, and a great story. I've had this game for about three years. I bought it for $5 during the 2012 summer sales, and I must say, I'm still playing it. The workshop feature adds so much more this game. The only problem I have found with this game is that singleplayer is a bit short and it does need a bit more to it (yes, I actually agree with those idiots who think this game is short), but the Workshop feature, Co-op mode, and replay value make up for it.  The Co-op mode is an interesting new game mode that is both frustrating and fun at the same time. This game is great, but Valve still can't count to three, even if a knife was at thier throats. So don't ever, ever, EVER expect Valve to make a Portal 3, but expect someone else to make it thanks to Portal's awesome community. Great game, but it needs a damn sequel. Come on Valve! What comes after two...?

9.7/10

Самая лучшая на мой взгляд головоломка, к тому же без насилия, крови и прочего, без набора оружия. Всё простенько, но со вкусом. Звуковое сопровождение безуречно, российский перевод точный и безупречный, концовка прекрасная, песня от ГЛЭДоС в конце вообще радует. Радует также и редактор уровней. В общем 10 из 10.

Levou a mecânica inovadora do primeiro jogo mais longe, trazendo ótimas novidades. Aumentou a duração, trouxe uma storyline bacana, melhorou substancialmente. Só ainda ficou devendo uma parte no mundo exterior. E as piadas constantes, irritantes e sem graça, acabam tirando uns pontos também. Um humor forçado que o jogo tenta empurrar goela abaixo durante quase toda sua extensão. Ah, o multiplayer dele também é bem legal, possibilitando mecânicas diferentes do que as vistas no modo single player.

NOTA: 9.5/10
